importantArticles.headline: The average of price targets set by Wall Street analysts indicates a potential upside of 27.6% in Veren (VRN). While the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric is questionable, the positive trend in earnings estimate revisions might translate into an upside in the stock.
importantArticles.title: Wall Street Analysts See a 27.59% Upside in Veren (VRN): Can the Stock Really Move This High?
